localised_description: The living send their champion to end us, but we will end this breather.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Beastmen's gor thinks to frustrate us. End the creature.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The northern Gods task their Champions to come against us.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Witch King's minions are abroad - one in particular must be silenced.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Dwarfs, vile little things who tend to stick their noses where they don't belong. Silence this creature.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Men, nothing more than fuel for the fire; add another corpse to the pyre.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Greenskins are nothing more than noisome beasts, and now one of their number acts against us. Kill it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Asur are cowards. They do not send their hosts against us, but merely mouthed agitators instead. Kill their agent.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Accursed reptiles send an agent to interfere with our plans! End this creature's pathetic existence.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Skaven foes try and undermine us; this will not happen again. Find their verminous agent and slay it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Insolent Fools! They refuse to bow the knee; their souls are forfeit and will be mine!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: My children, you are so vein to defy my word, I gave you life, and I can take it just as easily.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Elves and their tree-creatures interfere in our expansion by sending an agent against us. Find the threat and destroy it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: They think their Lady can save them; we will purge and seed their lands.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The ice dunes of the Dark Elves are a new realm to add to our own. The land of the dead will stretch to all corners.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The mountain realms of the Dwarfs are valuable to us, for we need what lies in the stone. Claim it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The men of the north think themselves safe from the dead. Take their land and disabuse them of such a notion.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: These filthy creatures are nothing but a hindrance. Purify them from this region and claim it as our own.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The High Elves' arrogance will be their undoing; after all, we are truly immortal, not these fleshy things. Take their realm as punishment!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The reptiles view their borders with intransigence. They must make way as Undeath is Ascendant. Claim this realm for the Undead.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Nagash demands this land be conquered from the vermin that infest this realm, all shal fall before him.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The true righful ruler, take it back. These are your lands!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Your ambitions and desires cloud your mind; do not fear, Daddy's home.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The woodland realms offer us unique opportunities. Claim such a realm and watch our darkness will infest it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The rose unfurls to reveal its thorns, does it? We shall show these living fools what a brier patch truly is. Declare war.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: These sub-man creatures are no threat to the glory of Nasgah. War on them until their extinction.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Gods of Chaos stand at the gates to the Realm of Souls, siphoning souls for their own causes; this will not stand, Nagash bows before no God.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Make war on the Dark Ones in their frozen climes, for that is the only meaningful discourse they understand.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Dwarfs come to make war and we should not disappoint such stunted foes. Make short work of them!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This king calls himself an 'emperor', but his rule is weak - he is mortal for one thing. Teach this imposter the true meaning of sovereignty - declare war.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Greenskin menace has festered long enough! Declare war on these primitive tribes and purge them from the world!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The High Elves have become a pain in your regal behind, so it is time to end their place in this world. Call the legions to war!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Lizardmen threat can no longer be ignored. Declare war on the cold-blooded kind, let them see the power of death.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The ratmen infestation grows. These creatures have ever been a threat, it is time for them to finally perish.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Some do not see your sovereignty and must be dominated. The legions shall meet in battle.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The time to show allegiance has passed; thus I will force your knee, attached to you or not.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The tree-Elves need uprooting. Make war on such long-lived creatures, and show them the true path to immortality.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The prey is marked. Ensure their end.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Conquer these lands for they are yours, whether its denizens - living or dead - know it yet.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Bring about the end of this being - we cannot suffer him to exist any longer!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This army is threat to your rule. Seek them out and bring them to battle.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This place contains crypts of a lost dynasty - it must be scoured.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Such a settlement, teeming with souls, it must be destroyed. Nagash demands it!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Seek out this serf in battle - this dog - and end his pitiful life. Nagash demands nothing less!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This Beastmen may not be the best specimen of their feeble race but it should still be dealt with.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: While these men seem obsessed with skulls, we'll take any bones on offer - especially from the body of this Champion!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: In battle, hunt down this Dark Elf pretender and extinguish his soul.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: There is a Dwarf that frustrates the will of Nagash. Hunt down this nuisance in battle and bring about his death!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The thralls to this child-emperor mock us. We should seek them out in battle and take their flesh-coated skulls.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Find this Orc filth that mocks us. Hunt down in the battle and end it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Seek out the arrogant breather. Find the High Elf herald and slay it! Our honour demands it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: These reptiles use titles such as 'Oldblood' the arrogance! Ours would be the oldest blood there is, if we still had any. Hunt down this lizard usurper and end it!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Seek out Nagash's bane - the Skaven creature that challenges us. Kill the creature in battle, crush his skull under the weight of dominance!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This serf - this slave - dares to defy you. Hunt it down in battle and break its soul!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Hunt down the Vampire-spawn - find the creature that dares to refuse your call and end its existence quickly.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This Elven creature has been sent to challenge us - seek it out during the battle and kill it. Grind its skull into the ground!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Errantry War of the men from the north blocks our way. Engage them with our legions.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: We have let these Beastmen roam our lands long enough. Bring the warherd to battle!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Chaos comes. The filth-encrusted gods of the north must be stopped. Send your legions forth!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Druchii come. Engage their dark host and stop them!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Dwarfs send a throng against us. Nagash demands their destruction - engage them in battle!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The uncivilised meat-sacks from the north have raised their banners against us. Meet them in battle - raise the legion!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: An Orc rabble has invaded. Show these filth who should be invading who!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The High Elves send a host to face us. Do not let this challenge go.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Bretonnians invade! Repel these living trespassers, make them pay for disturbing the dead!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: So the Beastmen wish to walk the land of the dead? So be it!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: A Chaos Horde, sent by their vile Gods, invades our lands. Our God-king demand they should be repelled!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Witch King's thralls dare to invade our lands - these usurpers must be stopped!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Dwarfs dare to invade our territory, a foolish decision. Send them back to their mountain burrows!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: So the men of the north dare invade the lands of the dead. Slay them, then raise them, make them clamour for their green and soft lands.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Orcs invade. Show them the true meaning of Waaar!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: A High Elf host invades the lands of the ever-living. Repel these trespassers.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Lizardmen invade! Push these creatures back into their fetid jungles.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Coming from their lairs, the Skaven invade! Send these pests to the abyss!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: It would have been amusing if it wasn't for the inconvenience. Yet another pretender invades that must be stopped.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Some of your kin send their legions against us; this is a slight that will not stand. Halt this pathetic invasion.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Wood Elves dare plant their roots in our unholy soil. Stop this Elven invasion!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: War is not the only answer. An alliance is required, for now.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: These men defile their dead, parading them around and puppeteering them in mockery of you, my lord; plunder their crypts and raise their dead to fight against them.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Dark Elf lands hide much valuable lore and secrets to eternal life. Raid their lands and seek such knowledge!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Crack open the Dwarfen Holds and raid their lands, homes and tombs for anything of value.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This young race of men have stolen secrets that belong to Nagash. We shall go, raid and return what has always been ours.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Orcs have looted and stolen from us for too long. Now, raid their slum lands!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Enter High Elf lands and ravage! No longer will these arrogant upstarts keep what should be ours!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: No longer will the Lizardmen hide their so-called knowledge from us. Seek out their treasures, their plaques of lore. Raid their habitat.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: We shall plunder the resources of the ratmen. Raid their warrens, destroy their under-world!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: This inferior king hides relics we need. Raid his lands, scatter the sands and his legions. All we survey is ours.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Some of the Vampire-kin have locked away treasures that were rightfully yours, reclaim what is owed.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Enter the tree-strewn paths of the Wood Elves and take their life-source - claim it for the Supreme Lord of the Dead.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Under our feet awaits a long-dead legion, eternally loyal and ready to serve. All they needs is for you to utter an incantation of awakening.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Destroy a living city of Bretonnia. Send their presents fleeing into our bony embrace!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Seek out a city of the Dark Elves and raze it to the ground. Every stone must tumble. Nagash demands nothing less.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Dwarfholds of the stunted are a ripe target for our legions. Make it so.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: These men have their own "god" of death that inhabits every stone and garden in their vile realm. We will show them whar a true god of death looks like, topple their city.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Orcs gather in one of their settlements. Raise the legions and destroy it.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Gleaming towers of the High Elves attempt to rival the glory of the Black Pyramid. This cannot be allowed to stand - literally.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The temple-cities of the Lizardmen are a cache of lost lore that could bring aid in the Great Ritual, unseal their crypts and burn what is left.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Seek out the Skaven nests and put an end to these vermin once and for all!
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The city of a rival Tomb King dares to compete with our greatness! Raze it, and execute execute all who built it, to ensure the Black Pyramid remains the greatest death shrine.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: They claim to be creatures of the night, You Are The Night! We will tear down their castles and rip them from their slumber.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The Wood Elves lurk in the deep woods. Send in your skeletal legions and fell any tree that could hold such vermin.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Raise a Tomb Prince or Wight King, these ancient warrior's martial skills will help our cause.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Let's summon a Gunnery Wight shall we? It'll aid our missile units no end - the expertise they've retained from their, er, actual lives, is invaluable to us.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Summon a Liche Priest from the Mortuary Cult to serve.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Call forth a mighty Archai, a sentient vassal bound to your will.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: A Vampire Count under our dominion is a powerful ally. Just remember, they are as ambitious in their quest for power as us.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: We require a Screaming Skull Catapult to ensure your reign.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Bring forth the doomed knights to serve your majesty.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Summon the legions from the Great Halls so they may serve you in battle.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: The archers of ancient Nehekhara remain the best in the world. Ensure they join your legions.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Awaken the war statuary. Stone must march.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.

localised_description: Order the chariots into service at once.
localised_mission_completed_text: Success! You have achieved one of your goals.
